subject: Flight Booking Confirmation
body: Hi Adwait, your Delta flight from LAX to JFK is confirmed for Friday, June 21st at 2:15 PM. Check-in opens 24 hours prior to departure. Safe travels!

subject: Lunch This Friday?
body: Hey! Want to grab lunch on Friday around 12:30pm? Let me know if that works. - Jacob

subject: Reminder: Team Sync
body: Let’s catch up for a quick sync this Sunday afternoon. Nothing formal — just touch base on the Q2 goals and OKRs.
